attributes.action: stop handing out top of the range cars as invalidity vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government hand out top of the range cars bought and paid for by working class citizens, these are then insured, taxed and mot'd by us.  Most working class citizens cannot afford a new top of the range car every 3 years as the so called invalid are entitled to, why can't you just have a standard low emissions, low cost vehicle if this is what is required.
